project.description: this project is cvesa web ui

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e
GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" #IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) IMAGE_VERSION=v0.0.1 PROJECT_NAME="cvesa-web-ui"
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) fi
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/cve-sa-backend/web-ui else echo "docker not installed." exit fi
cd $WORKSPACE
cat Dockerfile
docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/cve-sa-backend/web-ui:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/cve-sa-backend/web-ui:$IMAGE_VERSION
docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/cve-sa-backend/web-ui:$IMAGE_VERSION
